lead_paragraph: MANDEL--Joseph C. JCC Association extends our deepest condolences to our past chair and benefactor, Morton Mandel, on the loss of his brother and partner. The Mandel Foundation's generous and continuing support of the work of JCCs is at the foundation of our work. The establishment of The Jack, Joseph, and Morton Mandel Centers for Jewish Education and Excellence in Management and Leadership are essential to the success of JCCs throughout North America. Stephen P. Seiden, Chair Alan Mann, Interim President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MANDEL, JOSEPH C

snippet: MANDEL--Joseph C. JCC Association extends our deepest condolences to our past chair and benefactor, Morton Mandel, on the loss of his brother and partner. The establishment of The Jack, Joseph, and Morton Mandel Centers for Jewish Education and Excellence in Management and Leadership are essential to the success of JCCs throughout North America. Stephen P. Seiden, Chair Alan Mann, Interim President 1/3
